title: Provides that offers to plead guilty or pleas of guilty, later withdrawn are inadmissible in civil trials
summary: Provides that offers to plead guilty or pleas of guilty, later withdrawn are inadmissible in civil trials; evidence of statements made in connection with such pleas or offers is inadmissible.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to admissibility into evidence of withdrawn statements against interest
